name: Clouding-999
description:
YUME NIKKI fangame i made for the Dream Diary Game Jam 6.

it's just my take on the yume nikki fangame type of games! it doesn't have a lot-lot of content atm but i will update it when i feel like it.

i based stuff in here on my own dreams and experience with isolation and depression, though it might not come trough because there isn't a lot.

still, it was fun to work on! if you like lcd dem and ultraviolet (games) you will probably like it.

Version 1.0 includes: 
  • 4 effects
  • cool effect combo mechanics
  • 13 worlds you can explore
  • no endings (sorry)
  • weird noises i found on freesound.org
  • *real* soundtracks also!
controls: walk with arrow keys, shift to leave the computer, 9 to wake up, 1 to interact with an effect, 3 to remove an effect.NOTE: tell me if you find any bugs. you can send them to my tumblr @windmills2

(hint: the speed effect is in the pink door!!)
